Articles.Content:
After a long day of banging my head on my keyboard, I had an idea to design a reusable (semi) reliable freight transporter. The result: The Hermes Class Lifter!

Mods Required: KW Challenger, Sunday Punch, C7, Quabits\' pack, tuned sas, and Silisko\'s Pack.

Pictures:

Freight is interchangeable

With a little skill it is easy to get this into orbit and back again!

Jeb Approved!^^^

She\'s a little wobbly on the launch pad, so don\'t dilly-dally too long before hitting the thrusters!
Love it! Looks like a long march from china!
thats a very tidy rocket you have there.
Try using a PF shroud instead of a decoupler. nice though
